entries.summary: Implemented engine partition: Character/NPC/Location/Journey models, WorldGraph, StateEngine with traverse/interact adjudication and JSON persistence. 35 passing tests.
Implemented Arbiter Tools API: schema.py (6 result types) and api.py (ArbiterTools façade with 6 tool methods). 15 tool tests + integration flow.
Implemented UI Shell: Main Menu, Character Creation, Gameplay Loop, Rich Text Formatting, and Plain Text Triggers. 57 passing tests.
Implemented GM Agent (Partition 4) with LiteLLM architecture. Config driven (assets/agents.json, assets/prompts/gm.toml), tool-use loop, and console integration.
Initiative Complete. Synthesized Canon (Product, UX, Tech, Modules) and archived Active Specs.
